column4: Hey, is there a way to force packages to install despite lack of dependencies? I have a couple packages that depend on each other (guile-1.6-libs, libguile-ltdl-1, and libqthreads-12). I'd use apt-get, but the computer I'm working on has no internet connection.
you should be able to just use a single dpkg command to install both.
are you doing both in the same line?
